text:
Larian CEO confirms the studio is using generative AI to "explore ideas, flesh out PowerPoint presentations, develop concept art and write placeholder text."

He says there won’t be any AI-generated content in Divinity — "everything is human actors; we’re writing everything
A no-nonsense roadmap to actually understand generative AI.
Microsoft literally dropped the best free Generative AI course you’ll ever see
how twitter niggas look at you when you don't find generative AI slop funny

If you're using generative AI for concept art then yes, you DID use AI generated content in your game.

What the hell makes you think visual artists don't deserve the same respect as actors and writers?

I know everyone loves Larian but tbh even the use of generative AI for concept art that won't be in the final game isn't good imo!! it's still using generative AI as a replacement for human creativity in that context. just not a fan of this.

NEW LABS EXPERIMENT 

Introducing Disco, an experimental way to discover new generative AI features on the web. Our first feature, GenTabs, uses Gemini 3 to remix your open tabs into totally custom apps to help you get more out of the web.

Learn more and join the waitlist →
‘The concept phase’ is the absolute worst time to be using generative AI. You’re poisoning your creation at the root, you’re immediately limiting your vision. Why on earth would you ever do that???
I hate generative AI and how harmful it is to artists and I just want it to go away already.

Not even generative. I'd call the kind of ai we should hate "uncreative ai" as these try to replace the creative process

What is Generative AI?

It’s advanced tech that creates text, images, audio, and video.

Coca-Cola used it to:

• Capture the nostalgic essence of the 1995 ad
• Reimagine it with modern visuals
• Create something that couldn’t have been done before

The Generative AI ecosystem is evolving into a full tech stack — powering autonomous AI agents.
From infrastructure and LLMs to RAG pipelines, agent behaviors and orchestration layers, this framework shows the 6 layers driving next-gen AI systems.

Credit: 
@goyalshalini

#AI
Do tech people who talk like this about generative AI realize that every day we are inundated with hundreds of examples of it and can see its potential for ourselves?

I hate generative ai so much. fuck chatgpt, grok, gemini, whatever. it needs to die. it needs to be destroyed. it's making things unnecessarily expensive. People who continue to support it are just dogshit losers.
What are some methods you use to identify generative AI content on the Internet?

Big news. Google's new Generative AI Platform is now available to all.

Developers can now access text model powered by PaLM 2, Embeddings API for text, and other foundation models in Model Garden, as well as leverage user-friendly tools in Generative AI Studio for model tuning

to conclude, there are no benefits of generative ai. there is no excuse for generative ai. there is no ethical use for generative ai. 
you are not “cool” or “smart” or “modern” for typing to an automated response 
you are inducing an ai-psychosis (a real thing, btw)+
If you’re upset with the current RAM prices, but not upset with people using generative AI like chatGPT, PLEASE let this be the thing that gets you angry. GenAI is ruining everything. Stop using it.
"generative ai makes art accessible" boooooo. horses on banana
yes, I do think i’m better than you cause i’ve never used chatGPT or generative AI

Generative models shouldn’t just generate. They should be steerable by your commands. Meet Steer3D: edit generated 3D assets with text in one forward pass. Trained on only 100k synthetic data, it shows that we can make generative models responsive to signals from another

We poured years of our lives into this game and only worked with real human artists on everything: From the writing to the coding, all work was done by human hands. We do not endorse generative AI and will never use it.

woke up to my absolute nightmare today :( please do not feed my artwork to AI ! Generative Ai is trained by real artists artwork and this is completely disheartening as an artist to see. What am I supposed to do ?
